website_summaries.verdict: A wide range of small animals absolutely love the sweet and creamy crunch of yogurt chips, and these banana yogurt-coated nuggets are as healthy for your little pet as they are delicious.
pros: Oats, maltodextrin, sugar, and soybean oil are the first 4 ingredients
For chinchillas, guinea pigs, and rabbits
cons: There is plenty of sugar in these sweet treats, so share them sparingly

customer_reviews.title: My rat-a-tat-tats love these!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! We have 4 rats in our home - 2 little girls and two big boys. I love spoiling our babies. We buy a lot of treats from Kaytee and this banana one is one of their favorites. They are a decent price, but may be an add on item, so beware. I usually order my treats when I order food, so it's no issue. Make sure you don't feed your fur babies TOO many treats. Please feed them a good basic diet recommended for them with treats given at a reasonable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Bunz

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Rabbits and guinea pigs should not have these!! They cannot properly digest dairy products, so these are reall bad for them. The only good treats that I have found are the oxbow brand. I bought them before doing proper research and learning how bad these are for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies don’t like as much
customer_reviews.text: Well, I really wanted to give a good review but my bunnies are so picky! They did not like them. They first refused to even look at them lol but later they did chew a tiny bite of of a few......the snacks are basically just still sitting there. Nobody wants them lol. But my order came so fast. That was great. I will say that I’ve had other bunnies before them and some of my buns actually do like these snacks so there is still hope for other buyers. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Taniaess1

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughters bunny and she loves them. She rattles her cage when she sees us come near with the bag. She grabs it out of our hand and takes it to the corner and settles down to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla approved!
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas love these! These treats are larger than I expected, but they aren't too big for them to handle. I regularly purchase Kaytee treats for them. They are very healthy. My chinchillas are now 15 an 13 years old. I also love that these are offered with the subscribe and save program.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Reed

customer_reviews.title: Judah (my mini lop rabbit) approves!
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves these! I usually give him a few throughout the week and they're gone within 5 to 10 minutes, so he definitely enjoys them. They haven't given him any digestive upset that I can tell either. You also get a generous amount in the bag so they're a great value too.
customer_reviews.author: ChalmondFashew

customer_reviews.title: One happy camper, I mean hamster ...
customer_reviews.text: My Teddy Bear Hamster Rex loves these. I cut them in half and give him one half a day. And they are at a great price. The expiration date will probably go bad before I have even had a chance to use them up, which means months. He really loves these, oh I already said that ... :)
customer_reviews.author: Hello`

customer_reviews.text: Bout for rabbit and she loved them would go crazy every time she seen the bag and omg the value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Finally Scrumptious likes them
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing my review. My rabbit finally took a bite now he loves these gross looking and smelling treats. They make me gag but he now goes crazy for them. I took them out of the original package and stored them with some other treats he enjoys. Took a while for him to try these, but now he is happy so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Nichole

customer_reviews.title: My son's chinchilla just loves these! He doesn't give ...
customer_reviews.text: My son's chinchilla just loves these! He doesn't give Houston a lot of treats but when he does it's always some form of Kaytee yogurt treats. He goes nuts as soon as he smells them and it's so cute to watch him get so excited. These area winner!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen W.

customer_reviews.title: My rabbits don't like it that much
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits like bananas, and freeze dried banana chips but not these. The love the wild berry, and will eat these eventually, without that much enthusiasm.
customer_reviews.author: Mike at the solar home

customer_reviews.title: Artifically flavored, but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the fact that a) it's flavored and b) flavored banana, of all things! But I can't argue with the results, the rabbit loves them, even though he doesn't really like bananas...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Mommy

customer_reviews.title: plentiful and big
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are several of them so the bag lasts awhile, even for four rats. The rats like how big they are! The little stinkers eventually started scraping off the soft covering and saving the crunchy part for later. Will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: crud

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says they taste great
customer_reviews.text: My Buns and my daughter's favorite treats. Yes my daughter is human and an adult but she loves these to
customer_reviews.author: Kdog12

customer_reviews.title: One of my rabbits likes Kaytee Fiesta Banana Flavor Yogurt ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my rabbits likes Kaytee Fiesta Banana Flavor Yogurt Dipped treats. The other bunny will finely eat one when she realizes it is the only treat for the day. I do wish these products were made without artificial ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: Tasty chews
customer_reviews.text: These yogurt chews are a bit more expensive than the regular yogurt chews but my rabbit loves them because of their banana flavor (better than the berry flavored kind). One or two at a time is all he needs so the package lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: First but not the last time I buy this product
customer_reviews.text: My older rattie absolutely loves these. He just sits there on my shoulder and slowly eats his nummies.
customer_reviews.author: wendellsue66

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Snack
customer_reviews.text: They're banana puffs more like. My boys (dumbo and fancy rat) prefer the blueberry ones. I've found they'll eat all of the yogurt off of these ones and leave behind the creepy looking innards.
customer_reviews.author: Vrey

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla loves
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my chinchilla will eat. She actually will turn down all the other treats I have for her, but when I pull these out and give her one she gets all impatient and pulls at the bag if it’s close enough for her to get too. She goes wild for these things.
customer_reviews.author: Brieanna Laird

customer_reviews.title: Bun approved.
customer_reviews.text: MY two buns love these! Though one of them just chews the yogurt off and disposes of the center. Nice amount for the price! Way cheaper than any pet store!
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: We buy these for our pig and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: Not good for bunnies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them but then started looking at info online. Rabbits should not eat yogurt drops. A lot of people wonder why they are still being sold.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roth

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more!
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits I only have 2 and they are in the house! They absolutely love these, and other Kaytee yogurt treat!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Good piggy treat!
customer_reviews.text: My piggies seem to like these pretty well. I would probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Fall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice treat for bunnies, doesn't really smell like bananas. Don't know whether they taste like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hazel loves them
customer_reviews.text: Our rabbit loves these! We kinda figured she would since she goes nuts for small pieces of banana too.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas seem to enjoy these. They aren't their favorite, but they happily eat them. They are larger than I thought which is a good thing. I'll buy these again for them.
customer_reviews.author: Reader 1

customer_reviews.title: Guinea goes nuts for these
customer_reviews.text: Loves them glad i got them. Smaller bag than i thought but its jammed full so i at least i didnt buy air. I think they are a great treat.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: My bunny loves these
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies favorite treat. He goes nuts when he sees the package.
customer_reviews.author: hs

customer_reviews.title: Bunny love
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves these. Eats one at a time, chewing every bit of it and eating up any crumbs
customer_reviews.author: Lora Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rats absolutely love these. And if you can't believe a rat, who else can you trust?
customer_reviews.author: Walrus63

customer_reviews.title: Although I wish it was more natural ingredients my bun ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish it was more natural ingredients my bun goes crazy over these. Whenever he hears a bag open he starts running around searching for these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's ok, better if it were all natural
customer_reviews.text: Well, our rabbit likes it. Why can't they make products without artificial ingredients!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gorga

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits favorite and hard to find.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 rabbits and they are picky about their treats. Banana is their favorite and they go nuts for these. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boldman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my bunnies are addicted to these. They absolutely go bonkers over them
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Nida

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Bunnies
customer_reviews.text: Our Holland Lop is not into eating bananas but she loves these yogurt treats.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie M

customer_reviews.title: loves it
customer_reviews.text: my little pet loves these treats can't get enough of them perfect size for her eats one at a time then comes back for more
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny absolutely loves yogurt bite. I would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: mom2002

customer_reviews.title: Fake food.
customer_reviews.text: The banana flavor smells like playdoh, and my chinchilla won’t eat them.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked good. My son's guinea pigs didn't care for them though
customer_reviews.author: Amber C Kittner

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: Rafiki finds this very tasty and runs as soon as he hears the bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad bad don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I just found out that dairy products are not good for bunnies digestive systems , I was wondering why my bunny had diarrhea all the time ,veterinarian told me it was YOGURT TREATS, they are NOT good for bunnies they can be FATEL, my bunny is doing much much better now I know she misses her treat but they are bad, there are other treats to get your bunny ,but be careful
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit and chinchilla loved these treats, and they arrived exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna L

customer_reviews.title: That's the bunny's opinion
customer_reviews.text: He's crazy about these treats. I, however, was not crazy about the shipping charge for putting this tiny bag of treats in a large box. It could easily have come in an envelope with a bit of cardboard around it for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Dee625

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a treat for my Chinchilla who loves treats but I had to end up throwing these away because he wouldnt touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: vitamin c makes bunnies get jiggy
customer_reviews.text: Banana explosion with vitamin c to back it up Bunny loves to dance with me with music on blast ever since she takes these 8 times daily
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: They are a great buy! He snatches them from my hand when ...
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves these! They are a great buy! He snatches them from my hand when it's treat time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much to her delight..
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny loves them, and they arrived even sooner than expected, much to her delight ... and relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kaytee Banana Flvor Yogurt Dipped Treat for Rabbit, Guinea Pig and Chinchilla, 3.5 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:3.5 ozKaytee Yogurt Dipped Treats are crunchy fortified nuggets with a smooth, delicious, fruit flavored yogurt coating. Yogurt dipped treats are a healthy and fun treat for your pet!
feature_bullets: Great Training Tool, Perfect Reward For Your Pet

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
